title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions with local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); chat, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama; supports streaming, chat, embeddings, custom timeouts.

title: ollama-cli (rust)
summary: Fast CLI tool written in Rust for chatting with Ollama models; supports themes, history, REPL.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Experimental fork bringing Ollama models into Vim/Neovim as a Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to run Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, streaming, chat, embeddings.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, delete, and streaming.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama REST API; integrates with LiveView for real-time chat demos.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines; pre-pull models and cache layers.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama; provides generated structs, streaming, and context cancellation.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama and common models to nixpkgs; reproducible local LLM setups.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered summarization, continuation, and Q&A inside notes.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models via threaded conversations.

title: ollama-rag-langchain tutorial
summary: Minimal repo showing how to build a private RAG pipeline combining Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma.
